FireBladeMod:Swipe.NAME: Swipe
FireBladeMod:Swipe.DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

FireBladeMod:Ember.NAME: Ember
FireBladeMod:Ember.DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. NL fireblademod:Flame. NL Apply !M! fireblademod:Burning.

FireBladeMod:Necronomisword.NAME: Necronomisword
FireBladeMod:Necronomisword.DESCRIPTION: There is no escape from this sword. NL Deal !D! damage !M! times.

FireBladeMod:BasicSmash.NAME: Basic Smash
FireBladeMod:BasicSmash.DESCRIPTION: fireblademod:Smash. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

FireBladeMod:SpinningSmash.NAME: Spinning Smash
FireBladeMod:SpinningSmash.DESCRIPTION: fireblademod:Smash. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

FireBladeMod:ComboCleave.NAME: Combo Cleave
FireBladeMod:ComboCleave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times.

FireBladeMod:SmashingEndurance.NAME: Smashing Endurance
FireBladeMod:SmashingEndurance.DESCRIPTION: fireblademod:Smash, fireblademod:Endurance. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! block. NL Exhaust.

FireBladeMod:SoulStrike.NAME: Soul Strike
FireBladeMod:SoulStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! fireblademod:Spirit Rend.

FireBladeMod:Shove.NAME: Shove
FireBladeMod:Shove.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, gain [E].

FireBladeMod:ScorchingStrike.NAME: Scorching Strike
FireBladeMod:ScorchingStrike.DESCRIPTION: fireblademod:Flame. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! fireblademod:Burning.

FireBladeMod:IronEndurance.NAME: Iron Endurance
FireBladeMod:IronEndurance.DESCRIPTION: fireblademod:Endurance. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

FireBladeMod:Feint.NAME: Feint
FireBladeMod:Feint.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

FireBladeMod:Turtle.NAME: Turtle
FireBladeMod:Turtle.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, draw 1 additional card.

FireBladeMod:SteadyEndurance.NAME: Steady Endurance
FireBladeMod:SteadyEndurance.DESCRIPTION: fireblademod:Endurance. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

FireBladeMod:OverCharge.NAME: Over Charge
FireBladeMod:OverCharge.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! times X fireblademod:Vigor. NL Exhaust the next attack you play.

FireBladeMod:ArmSmash.NAME: Arm Smash
FireBladeMod:ArmSmash.DESCRIPTION: fireblademod:Smash. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Exhaust.

FireBladeMod:TorsoSmash.NAME: Torso Smash
FireBladeMod:TorsoSmash.DESCRIPTION: fireblademod:Smash. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

FireBladeMod:SpiritEndurance.NAME: Spirit Endurance
FireBladeMod:SpiritEndurance.DESCRIPTION: fireblademod:Endurance. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! fireblademod:Blessed. NL Exhaust.

FireBladeMod:DoubleDash.NAME: Double Dash
FireBladeMod:DoubleDash.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Next turn, draw !FireBladeMod:M2! card.
FireBladeMod:DoubleDash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Next turn, draw !FireBladeMod:M2! cards.

FireBladeMod:ScorchingCleave.NAME: Scorching Cleave
FireBladeMod:ScorchingCleave.DESCRIPTION: fireblademod:Flame. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies . NL Apply !M! fireblademod:Burning to ALL enemies.

FireBladeMod:HealthyEndurance.NAME: Healthy Endurance
FireBladeMod:HealthyEndurance.DESCRIPTION: fireblademod:Endurance. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Heal !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

FireBladeMod:Arson.NAME: Arson
FireBladeMod:Arson.DESCRIPTION: Add a random fireblademod:Flame card into your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

FireBladeMod:AdrenalineBoost.NAME: Adrenaline Boost
FireBladeMod:AdrenalineBoost.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a random fireblademod:Smash and a random fireblademod:Endurance card into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
FireBladeMod:AdrenalineBoost.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a random Upgraded fireblademod:Smash and a random Upgraded fireblademod:Endurance into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

FireBladeMod:Unbalance.NAME: Unbalance
FireBladeMod:Unbalance.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you attack this enemy, gain !M! Block. NL Exhaust.

FireBladeMod:Accelerant.NAME: Accelerant
FireBladeMod:Accelerant.DESCRIPTION: fireblademod:Flame. NL Apply !M! fireblademod:Burning. NL Gain !FireBladeMod:M2! fireblademod:Fervor.

FireBladeMod:FireBarrier.NAME: Fire Barrier
FireBladeMod:FireBarrier.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal !M! damage back.

FireBladeMod:SmokeScreen.NAME: Smoke Screen
FireBladeMod:SmokeScreen.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a fireblademod:Flame card, gain !M! Block.

FireBladeMod:SoulSword.NAME: Soul Sword
FireBladeMod:SoulSword.DESCRIPTION: Every !FireBladeMod:M2! times you deal attack damage, apply !M! fireblademod:Spirit Rend.

FireBladeMod:FinalSmash.NAME: Final Smash
FireBladeMod:FinalSmash.DESCRIPTION: fireblademod:Smash. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

FireBladeMod:GlassGreatsword.NAME: Glass Greatsword
FireBladeMod:GlassGreatsword.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Decrease the damage of this card by !M! this combat.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Decrease the damage of this card by

FireBladeMod:DebilitatingBlow.NAME: Debilitating Blow
FireBladeMod:DebilitatingBlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Weak.

FireBladeMod:EternalEndurance.NAME: Eternal Endurance
FireBladeMod:EternalEndurance.DESCRIPTION: fireblademod:Endurance. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Block is not removed at the start of your next turn. NL Exhaust.
FireBladeMod:EternalEndurance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: fireblademod:Endurance. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Block is not removed at the start of your next !M! turns. NL Exhaust.

FireBladeMod:AntiMagic.NAME: Anti-Magic
FireBladeMod:AntiMagic.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Artifact. NL Apply !FireBladeMod:M2! fireblademod:Anti-magic. NL Exhaust.
FireBladeMod:AntiMagic.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !M! Artifact. NL Apply !FireBladeMod:M2! fireblademod:Anti-magic. NL Exhaust.

FireBladeMod:Improvise.NAME: Improvise
FireBladeMod:Improvise.DESCRIPTION: Put !M! card from your discard pile into your hand.
FireBladeMod:Improvise.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put !M! cards from your discard pile into your hand.

FireBladeMod:HellFire.NAME: Hellfire
FireBladeMod:HellFire.DESCRIPTION: fireblademod:Flame. NL Apply !M! fireblademod:Burning. NL fireblademod:Fervor affects this card !FireBladeMod:M2! times.

FireBladeMod:AfterBurn.NAME: After Burn
FireBladeMod:AfterBurn.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain !M! fireblademod:Flame Barrier.

FireBladeMod:RapidHits.NAME: Rapid Hits
FireBladeMod:RapidHits.DESCRIPTION: Once per turn when an attack card is played it deals an extra hit. NL The hit deals !D! damage to ALL enemies.

FireBladeMod:TargetWeakness.NAME: Target Weakness
FireBladeMod:TargetWeakness.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Existing Weak and Vulnerable on the enemy are increased by !M!.
FireBladeMod:TargetWeakness.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Existing Weak, Vulnerable, and fireblademod:Spirit Rend on the enemy are increased by !M!.

FireBladeMod:FerventSlash.NAME: Fervent Slash
FireBladeMod:FerventSlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! fireblademod:Fervor. NL At the end of this turn, lose !M! fireblademod:Fervor.

FireBladeMod:FinishingBarrage.NAME: Finishing Barrage
FireBladeMod:FinishingBarrage.DESCRIPTION: fireblademod:Unnate. NL Deal !D! damage for each fireblademod:Smash in your exhaust pile. NL Exhaust.

FireBladeMod:Refreshment.NAME: Refreshment
FireBladeMod:Refreshment.DESCRIPTION: fireblademod:Unnate. NL Ethereal. NL Heal !M! HP for each fireblademod:Endurance in your exhaust pile. NL Exhaust.

FireBladeMod:BattleMage.NAME: Battle Mage
FireBladeMod:BattleMage.DESCRIPTION: Your attack damage is increased by fireblademod:Fervor. NL Your fireblademod:Flame cards are improved by Strength.

FireBladeMod:FlamingSword.NAME: Flaming Sword
FireBladeMod:FlamingSword.DESCRIPTION: fireblademod:Flame. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! fireblademod:Burning.

FireBladeMod:PyromancerForm.NAME: Pyromancer Form
FireBladeMod:PyromancerForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Your fireblademod:Flame cards apply !M! fireblademod:Spirit Rend.
FireBladeMod:PyromancerForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your fireblademod:Flame cards apply !M! fireblademod:Spirit Rend.

FireBladeMod:BattleStamina.NAME: Battle Stamina
FireBladeMod:BattleStamina.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you Exhaust an fireblademod:Endurance card, Block is not removed for !M! turn.

FireBladeMod:Blitzkreig.NAME: Blitzkreig
FireBladeMod:Blitzkreig.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you Exhaust a fireblademod:Smash card, gain [E].
FireBladeMod:Blitzkreig.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you Exhaust a fireblademod:Smash card, draw !M! card and gain [E].

FireBladeMod:MomentumStrikes.NAME: Momentum Strikes
FireBladeMod:MomentumStrikes.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each debuff on the enemy.

FireBladeMod:BodyAsFuel.NAME: Body As Fuel
FireBladeMod:BodyAsFuel.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your draw pile. NL Play the chosen card. NL Lose HP equal to !M! times its cost. NL Exhaust.

FireBladeMod:Wildfire.NAME: Wildfire
FireBladeMod:Wildfire.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! fireblademod:Burning. NL Add !FireBladeMod:M2! *burns into your discard pile.

FireBladeMod:Ignition.NAME: Ignition
FireBladeMod:Ignition.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply fireblademod:Burning to this enemy, they take !M! damage. NL Exhaust.

FireBladeMod:RollWithTheBlow.NAME: Roll With The Blow
FireBladeMod:RollWithTheBlow.DESCRIPTION: Once per turn when you take damage, draw !M! card.
FireBladeMod:RollWithTheBlow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL The first time each turn you take damage, draw !M! card.

FireBladeMod:AbsorbEnergy.NAME: Absorb Energy
FireBladeMod:AbsorbEnergy.DESCRIPTION: Once per turn when you take damage, gain an energy next turn.

FireBladeMod:LearnTells.NAME: Learn Tells
FireBladeMod:LearnTells.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL At the start of your turn, gain !M! Dexterity.
FireBladeMod:LearnTells.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! Dexterity.
